subtitles.text: Thank you for watching!

New member audition for Shihetsu Ebisu
Junior High School 2022 begins now!
Thank you!

Shirito Ebisu Middle School, also known
as Ebichu-Gakku

This May, the new members will be
auditioned

The total number of applications
collected from all over the country is
7,000

From there, 10 people who passed the
paper interview were promoted to the
final screening
3 nights and 4 days of audition training

The age and background are different,
but 10 students with the same dream
challenge
